productInformation.title: Create your Password Manager
productInformation.information-icon-one: Store all your passwords, data or any information here, forget about paper notes and unprotected applications
productInformation.information-icon-two: Create your master key: only you can access your secrets with it
productInformation.information-description-one: First of all, you must create a different password for your electronic belongings. You will not be able to recover your password, so remember it well.
productInformation.information-description-two: For example, your card number, the PIN and PUK of your mobile phone, the serial number of one of your devices or any information you need to have in a safe place.

formLogin.title: Create your Password Manager
formLogin.first-text: Store all your passwords, data or any information here, forget about paper notes and unprotected applications
formLogin.second-text: You will not be able to recover your password, so remember it well.
formLogin.info-label-password: You can also create a hint to help you remember your master password.
formLogin.hint-info-label: Create your hint to rememeber your password. (optional)

feedback.info-error: We were unable to modify your Master Password. Try again later.
feedback.info-success: Lorem ipsum dolor sit ament, consectetur adipiscing elit. Maecenas varius totor nibh.
